
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kybs0/p/18643823" title="发布于 2024-12-31 19:18">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Windows应用开发-常用工具</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<div data-page-id="BTtkd6ViroH2HgxYFgmcZOznnYc" data-lark-html-role="root" data-docx-has-block-data="false">
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LTokdM96WoQ3MpxVhCdcRcNRnel">&nbsp;<strong>.NET/WPF开发</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Zcu4drPw1olfMlxYdZWcijk2nvh" data-list="bullet">Visual Studio 最新版本是VS2022，官网下载：<a href="https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/zh-hans/vs/" rel="noopener nofollow">Visual Studio 2022 IDE - 适用于软件开发人员的编程工具</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Yu5ndgMLxolsEgxrWmdc64PBnfe" data-list="bullet">VsColorOutput 控制台可视化很强、编译会区分颜色输出，在VS扩展中在线安装最新VsColorOutput64</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VsqHd73GNoX1F2xr4Lec9OCdn1b" data-list="bullet">Reshaper 极大提升编码效率。官网下载&nbsp;<a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/resharper/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.jetbrains.com/resharper/</a>，或者使用破解版本Jetbrains Resharper 2022&nbsp;<span class="text-only" data-eleid="2"><span class="text-only" data-eleid="5-0">链接:&nbsp;<a class="link rich-text-anchor __anchor-intercept-flag__" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/19kPixg9IvBW-iEfDmfMBEQ?pwd=ahbe" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-eleid="5-1" data-lark-is-custom="false" data-lark-link="true">https://pan.baidu.com/s/19kPixg9IvBW-iEfDmfMBEQ?pwd=ahbe</a><span class="text-only" data-eleid="5-2">&nbsp;提取码: ahbe</span></span></span></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-V3Yrd9J3zodXnfxkr0Hcg5Dsnud" data-list="bullet">Git 选择最新版本安装&nbsp;<a href="https://registry.npmmirror.com/binary.html?path=git-for-windows/%20TortoiseGit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://registry.npmmirror.com/binary.html?path=git-for-windows/ TortoiseGit</a>，commit记录二分查找、解决代码冲突效率高&nbsp;<a href="https://tortoisegit.org/download/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://tortoisegit.org/download/</a>，可以结合使用</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MGpNdWrn4oN3Bkx5oQMcMINHnPb" data-list="bullet">NugetEfficientTool Nuget源码调试，替换Nuget为源码引用，提高组件化仓库调试效率&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/WindowsOrg/NugetEfficientTool" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/WindowsOrg/NugetEfficientTool</a></li>
</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EnpHdIylRoWswSxogv7cL9iWnFf">
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-AV9pdMKOLoccYlxoHJncEXiEn2e"><strong>应用发布</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YnKjdCESZowVTGx71XkcJlcnnFf" data-list="bullet">Innosetup 打包<a href="https://jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php" rel="noopener nofollow">Inno Setup</a>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kybs0/p/13806494.html">InnoSetup打包 添加.NET环境安装 - 唐宋元明清2188 - 博客园</a>&nbsp;、<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kybs0/p/9891310.html">InnoSetup 脚本打包及管理员权限设置 - 唐宋元明清2188 - 博客园</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Znf0dbzAboKuf2xscIZc6Vz2nmb" data-list="bullet">SmartAssembly 混淆<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/kybs0/p/12168031.html">混淆-SmartAssembly - 唐宋元明清2188 - 博客园</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-P035d72BYoPoiexZ1t8cLDBVnAh" data-list="bullet">签名 我熟悉的是沃通证书，可以申请EV pro代码证书，沃通会给U盘以及签名执行exe</li>
</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-AV9pdMKOLoccYlxoHJncEXiEn2e"><strong>效率工具</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SpL2dkHYAordEYxSFZ8cWRqNnGg" data-list="bullet">Snipaste 截图工具，强烈推荐。WindowsStore内安装</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NFEWdIzXQoo6fDxiMP7cSgEUnJK" data-list="bullet">ScreenToGif 录屏工具，WindowsStore内安装</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-O64ldxLvAoPpjMxZvJucaLo1nQy" data-list="bullet">TakeColor 取色工具&nbsp;<a href="https://files.cnblogs.com/files/kybs0/TakeColor.zip?t=1735618849&amp;download=true" target="_blank">TakeColor.zip</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QNELdrYbko4l9zxsHuRcm504ncg" data-list="bullet">Beyond Compare 文本数据对比&nbsp;<a href="https://www.beyondcompare.cc/wenti/zuo-shenme.html" rel="noopener nofollow">Beyond Compare能为我做什么？-Beyond Compare中文网站</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QNELdrYbko4l9zxsHuRcm504ncg" data-list="bullet">NotePad++ 临时编辑工具，以及文件夹批量查找字符串（个人推荐，比VS全局查找效率高）<a href="https://notepad-plus-plus.org/downloads/" rel="noopener nofollow">Downloads | Notepad++</a></li>
</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HvuDdUrgmoaTexxWQwScfWOsnKc">
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HvuDdUrgmoaTexxWQwScfWOsnKc"><strong>问题定位</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Stk9dVBipowdtPxeZmEcATSwnAe" data-list="bullet">Snoop Github下载最新版本<a href="https://github.com/snoopwpf/snoopwpf/releases" rel="noopener nofollow">Releases · snoopwpf/snoopwpf</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XZrgddn96oyXTSxkeoPcM7esnzP" data-list="bullet">
<div>网络相关</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HTyDd74aRoR7N7x01DQcLHhTnIe" data-list="bullet">Fiddler 网络抓包，可视化、过滤效率高，主要抓HTTP、HTTPS&nbsp;<a href="https://www.telerik.com/download/fiddler-everywhere" rel="noopener nofollow">Web Debugging Tool - Download Fiddler</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-OfyqdyfV0ouvgnxqddqcTC0VnRh" data-list="bullet">Wireshark 网络抓包，解析能力强，主要抓TCP、UDP&nbsp;<a href="https://www.wireshark.org/download.html" rel="noopener nofollow">Wireshark · Download</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GAPXdBwmDofThExKilYcrqBVnTf" data-list="bullet">PostMan 模拟以及请求后台接口&nbsp;<a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.postman.com/downloads/</a><a href="https://www.postman.com/downloads/" rel="noopener nofollow"><br></a></li>







</ul>







</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RvdTdARuFoHYo6xKEJycCSbgn0c" data-list="bullet">DotTrace 性能相关定位，启动以及运行中的耗时检测。JetBrains套件，可以安装破解版 链接:&nbsp;<a class="link rich-text-anchor __anchor-intercept-flag__" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-eleid="5-1" data-lark-is-custom="false" data-lark-link="true">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17</a><span class="text-only" data-eleid="5-2">&nbsp;提取码: rn17</span></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DCcVdQO0Cokkj7xRYrOcV9PpnMg" data-list="bullet">DotMemory 内存相关定位。JetBrains套件，破解版链接:&nbsp;<a class="link rich-text-anchor __anchor-intercept-flag__" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-eleid="5-1" data-lark-is-custom="false" data-lark-link="true">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17</a><span class="text-only" data-eleid="5-2">&nbsp;提取码: rn17</span></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DHMRdZWX1ooydNxZfvLckCqJngh" data-list="bullet">
<div>反编译相关</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DNmgdQC6Ro4mgzx2fcJcMZZcnic" data-list="bullet">DotPeek 反编译，比Dnspy更强，能自动优化那些混淆代码。JetBrains套件，破解版链接:&nbsp;<a class="link rich-text-anchor __anchor-intercept-flag__" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-eleid="5-1" data-lark-is-custom="false" data-lark-link="true">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YOzWAcKSp7lYMPqBgCFCiw?pwd=rn17</a><span class="text-only" data-eleid="5-2">&nbsp;提取码: rn17</span></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-D8yZdjp9loooZRxdXRgcK4pHnUh" data-list="bullet">De4dot 反混淆&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/de4dot/de4dot" rel="noopener nofollow">de4dot/de4dot: .NET deobfuscator and unpacker.</a></li>







</ul>







</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-S0Y8deP0koZO4XxsIe4cXv9Un4c" data-list="bullet">Dump文件 卡死、崩溃未知问题，可以查看详细信息。任务管理器选择进程，创建内存转存储文件，使用WinDbg、VS打开即可；系统Dump文件，可以在系统属性-设置“启动和故障信息”，Dump文件自动输出路径</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WYd8d0BtQo6M1LxB2sfcVrzsnpl" data-list="bullet">Spy++ windows窗口信息、进程线程视图等&nbsp;<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/debugger/introducing-spy-increment?view=vs-2022" rel="noopener nofollow">Spy++ 调试工具简介 - Visual Studio (Windows) | Microsoft Learn</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EO1GdVYN0opxdWxefEMcfSg8n7c" data-list="bullet">Event Viewer Windows系统事件查看器，可以查看应用及系统相关异常及崩溃日志</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CJZtdcGZjoASHWxeu6Sc5JQSniT" data-list="bullet">ProcessExplorer 超级进程查看器&nbsp;<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/linxinfa/article/details/106800716" rel="noopener nofollow">超强任务管理器Process Explorer的使用_process explorer使用-CSDN博客</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ZRBxdOutGobojqxuE0McHD9znpb" data-list="bullet">ProcessMonitor 进程监视器&nbsp;<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/sysinternals/downloads/procmon" rel="noopener nofollow">进程监视器 - Sysinternals | Microsoft Learn</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Y0FtdmUxEo1ynGxinWicMZqznGb" data-list="bullet">Registry Finder 注册表高效搜索工具&nbsp;<a href="https://registry-finder.com/" rel="noopener nofollow">Registry Finder</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VS55dj4t4ouBl2xyBp4cO2jHnqh" data-list="bullet">Regshot 注册表变更前后比较工具&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/Seabreg/Regshot" rel="noopener nofollow">Seabreg/Regshot: Regshot</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-N1u8dLqocoLH2oxHqxacisTBnyd" data-list="bullet">DebugView Debug调试日志查看&nbsp;<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/sysinternals/downloads/debugview" rel="noopener nofollow">DebugView - Sysinternals | Microsoft Learn</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Gwd2djTe1oSLh1xLFdpcyKJ4nOh" data-list="bullet">RemoteDebuger 远程调试可以确认其它设备下的运行环境&nbsp;<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/debugger/remote-debugging?view=vs-2022" rel="noopener nofollow">远程调试 - Visual Studio (Windows) | Microsoft Learn</a></li>




</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ULfhdn6vdoVddZxFS3ac9lmqnkc"><strong>外设系统相关工具（部分软件）</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Ppevd2bwaotUpOxE7ITcVve9nFg" data-list="bullet">BusHound 系统抓包工具，HID、IO消息&nbsp;<a href="http://bushound.com.cn/Bus-Hound.html" rel="noopener nofollow">bushound中文官方网站</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QwgudNU2kotC5pxGCgjcL4Bjnhb" data-list="bullet">UsbTreeView Windows系统USB设备分析工具&nbsp;<a href="https://www.uwe-sieber.de/usbtreeview_e.html" rel="noopener nofollow">USB Device Tree Viewer</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TYEtd9XG8oke3ExWqb6c0nVun1c" data-list="bullet">iperf 网络性能测试工具&nbsp;<a href="https://iperf.fr/" rel="noopener nofollow">iPerf - The TCP, UDP and SCTP network bandwidth measurement tool</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-K66vda0iEoZUfFxx241cDIVzn6p" data-list="bullet">
<div>网络相关</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-X94HdgKLyoYseyxLo0tchnjcnQf" data-list="bullet">intel ANT tool&nbsp;<a href="https://files.cnblogs.com/files/kybs0/intel_ANTTool.zip?t=1732005349&amp;download=true" target="_blank">ANTTool.zip</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RKAvdg8taooruRxF6awcABf1n4e" data-list="bullet">reatek WlanCommandLineUtility&nbsp;<a href="https://files.cnblogs.com/files/kybs0/Realtek_SingleSKUValidationTool.zip?t=1731949237&amp;download=true" target="_blank">SingleSKUValidationTool.zip</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-C5KWdocFQojyYfxsc77clBXKnti" data-list="bullet">Advanced_IP_Scanner 网络扫描工具&nbsp;<a href="https://www.advanced-ip-scanner.com/cn/" rel="noopener nofollow">Advanced IP Scanner – 免费下载网络扫描程序</a></li>





</ul>





</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JZjpdYQZbokGtLxcQEpcFLZHnDb" data-list="bullet">
<div>镜像/磁盘相关</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BxGAdXVyko524yx3ZsUcX1tZnrc" data-list="bullet">ventoy/rufus 系统安装&nbsp;<a href="https://www.ventoy.net/cn/" rel="noopener nofollow">Ventoy官网</a>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<a href="https://rufus.ie/zh/" rel="noopener nofollow">Rufus - 轻松创建 USB 启动盘</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-R2m9dXIOIoRdmnxVe0ycmX6Pnfd" data-list="bullet">DiskGenius 磁盘分区管理&nbsp;<a href="https://www.diskgenius.com/download.php" rel="noopener nofollow">DiskGenius Download Center | Free Download DiskGenius</a></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NmOYd3NSXo9OIixFKu4cL85Mnsc" data-list="bullet">SpaceSniffer 磁盘空间分析工具&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/redtrillix/SpaceSniffer/releases" rel="noopener nofollow">Releases · redtrillix/SpaceSniffer</a></li>





</ul>





</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Szo6dmtEUoFhK9xoq5Rc2efbnhX" data-list="bullet">UartAssist 串口调试工具&nbsp;<a href="https://www.nitwo.com/cn/download/UartAssist.html" rel="noopener nofollow">UartAssist Release Download</a></li>





</ul>
<p>上面罗列了Windows应用开发常用、个人使用比例多的工具集，总结下开发流程主要工具：</p>
<p>1. WPF应用开发 - 使用IDE VS、Reshaper，VsColorOutput、Git/TortiseGit、NugetEfficientTool</p>
<p>2. WPF应用发布 - 打包安装Innosetup、混淆SmartAssembly、证书签名wosign</p>
<p>3. WPF应用定位问题 - 界面Snoop、网络Fiddler/WireShark、性能DotTrace、内存DotMemory、反编译DotPeek、WinDbg-Dump文件分析、窗口Spy++、进程ProcessMonitor、注册表Registry Finder/Regshot&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>






</div>






</div>






</div>
</div>
